content: Upload your logo or generate it from text to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will affect all of your portals.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the branding settings on mobile devices, providing context for users when setting up their portal. The text will appear as a subtitle in a category page or settings dialog, informing users about the purpose of these settings and its impact on their portals.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "on-brand experience" is not accurately reflected. While "متوافقة مع هويتكم البصرية" (mutawafiqa ma' huwiyatakum al-basariya) translates to 'compatible with your visual identity,' it doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'on-brand'.  A more precise translation might emphasize consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like "تجربة متناسقة مع علامتكم التجارية" (tajriba mutanasqa ma' 'alamatukum al-tijariyya) which means 'experience consistent with your brand.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the plural imperative "حمّلوا" (hammilu) and "أنشئوه" (anshu'uh) seems overly formal and directive for this context. A more user-friendly tone might use a suggestion instead.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "حمّلوا شعاركم أو أنشئوه" to "يمكنكم تحميل شعاركم أو إنشاءه" (yumkinukum tahmil shaarukum aw insa'ahu) - 'You can upload your logo or create it.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "provide on-brand experience" is not accurately conveyed. "Brend təcrübəsi bəxş etmək" translates more literally to 'grant a brand experience', which is less natural than implying the ability to *create* or *deliver* a branded experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərinizə brend təcrübəsi yaratmaq (or təmin etmək) üçün loqonu yükləyin və ya mətndən yaradın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky.  Breaking it into two sentences might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərinizə brend təcrübəsi yaratmaq üçün loqonu yükləyin və ya mətndən yaradın. Bu parametrlər bütün portallarınıza təsir edəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "s ohledem na značku" (with regard to the brand) isn't the most natural or idiomatic translation of "on-brand experience". A better phrasing would convey a sense of aligning with the brand's identity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nahrajte své logo nebo jej vygenerujte z textu a zajistěte, aby uživatelé měli zážitek v souladu s vaší značkou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better readability. Combining the first two clauses with a conjunction would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nahrajte své logo nebo jej vygenerujte z textu, abyste uživatelům poskytli zážitek v souladu s vaší značkou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately translated. 'BrandingSubtitleMobile' likely refers to a concise descriptive subtitle. 'Experiencia de marca' is a literal translation that might be too formal and lengthy for a subtitle.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise translation like 'experiencia personalizada' (personalized experience) or 'imagen de marca' (brand image), depending on the desired nuance.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure 'para brindar una experiencia de marca a sus usuarios' could be more fluent. It's a bit passive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'para ofrecer una experiencia de marca a sus usuarios' (to offer a brand experience to your users).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'aseutukset' (settlements/establishments) is an incorrect translation of 'settings'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of customizable options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Muuta 'aseutukset' sanaksi 'asetukset'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'tarjotaksesi brändikokemuksen käyttäjillesi' is a bit clunky. A more natural Finnish phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewording to 'luodaksesi brändimäisen käyttökokemuksen käyttäjillesi' or 'tarjotaksesi käyttäjillesi brändimäisen kokemuksen'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is translated as 'expérience de marque'. While technically correct, it lacks the nuance of 'consistent with your brand'. A more natural and accurate translation would convey that the experience aligns with the brand's identity and values.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Téléchargez votre logo ou générez-le à partir d'un texte pour offrir une expérience conforme à votre marque à vos utilisateurs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence flow could be slightly improved for better readability in French. The current translation is understandable but a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Téléchargez votre logo ou générez-le à partir d'un texte pour offrir une expérience de marque à vos utilisateurs. Ces paramètres affecteront tous vos portails.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'provide on-brand experience to your users' is not perfectly conveyed by '사용자에게 브랜드 경험을 제공하세요'. A more natural and accurate rendering would emphasize the *branding* aspect. While understandable, it lacks nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자에게 일관된 브랜드 경험을 제공하세요 (Useojae ilganeun brandeun gyeongheom-eul jegonghaseyo - Provide a consistent brand experience to your users).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the punctuation that mirrors the original English sentence structure. A period at the end is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 로고를 업로드하거나 텍스트에서 로고를 생성하여 사용자에게 브랜드 경험을 제공하세요. 이러한 설정은 모든 포털에 적용됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "on-brand experience" is not accurately translated. While "ຕາມລັກສະນະ" conveys a general sense of 'according to characteristics', it lacks the specific nuance of 'brand'. A more precise translation might incorporate the concept of branding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບໂຫຼດໂລໂກ້ຂອງທ່ານຫຼືສ້າງມັນຈາກຕົວະນິພົດເພື່ອໃຫ້ປະສົບການທີ່ສອດຄ່ອງກັບຕົວແบรນຂອງທ່ານ។ (Upload your logo or generate it from text to provide an experience that aligns with your brand.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portals' is translated as "ພອດທະນະ". The intended meaning likely refers to the user interfaces or applications. A more accurate translation would be more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການຕັ້ງຄ່າເຫຼົ່ານີ້ຈະສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ການໃຊ້ງານຂອງທ່ານທັງໝົດ (These settings will affect all your applications/usage).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pokazywać użytkownikom branding marki" is not a natural or accurate translation of "provide on-brand experience to your users." "Branding marki" is a literal translation of 'brand branding' and doesn't convey the intended meaning of providing a branded experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prześlij swoje logo lub wygeneruj je z tekstu, aby użytkownicy mieli spójny wizerunek marki. (Or: aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójny wizerunek marki.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Twoich portalach' is technically correct but could be improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Twoich portalach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "provide on-brand experience" is not accurately translated. "Proporcionar uma experiência de marca" is a bit literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning as effectively as something like "oferecer uma experiência alinhada com a sua marca" or "oferecer uma experiência consistente com a sua marca".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue o seu logótipo ou gere-o a partir de texto para oferecer uma experiência alinhada com a sua marca aos seus utilizadores. Estas definições afectarão todos os seus portais.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "fornecer experiência de marca aos seus usuários" is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express "provide on-brand experience to your users." A more natural phrasing would be something like "oferecer uma experiência alinhada à sua marca aos seus usuários" or "proporcionar uma experiência com a identidade da sua marca aos seus usuários".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Carregue seu logotipo ou gere-o a partir de texto para oferecer uma experiência alinhada à sua marca aos seus usuários.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de creștere a implicării şi de conștientizare a mărcii" is a literal and awkward translation of "on-brand experience." It doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning.  'On-brand experience' refers to an experience that aligns with a brand's identity and values.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Încărcați logo-ul dvs. sau generați unul din text pentru a oferi utilizatorilor dvs o experiență în concordanță cu imaginea mărcii. Aceste setări vor afecta toate portalurile dvs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "a mărcii" is slightly awkward; a more natural phrasing is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: a imaginii mărcii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "предоставить пользователям информацию о бренде" (provide users with information about the brand) isn't the most natural or accurate translation of "provide on-brand experience to your users." A better phrasing would focus on reflecting the brand identity, rather than just providing information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Загрузите свой логотип или сгенерируйте его из текста, чтобы создать узнаваемый образ бренда для ваших пользователей. Эти настройки повлияют на все ваши порталы.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately translated. 'වෙළඳ නාම අත්දැකීමක්' is a literal translation but may not convey the intended meaning of a consistent and branded user experience. A better translation would focus on conveying the concept of a consistent brand identity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ පරිශීලකයින්ට ඔබේ බ්‍රන්දය නිසි පරිදි දැකීමට හැකිවීම සඳහා

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'portals' is translated as 'ද්වාරවලට'. While 'ද්වාර' literally means doors or portals, in this context, it's likely referring to online platforms or interfaces. This can cause confusion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ සියලුම වේබ් අඩවිවලට බලපානු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not accurately translated. 'У складу са вашим брендом' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the meaning of providing a branded experience. It sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Препоручио бих да се преведе као 'у складу са вашим препознатљивим визуелним идентитетом' or 'да пружите искуство које одражава ваш бренд'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "provide on-brand experience" is not perfectly captured by "iskustvo u skladu sa vašim brendom". A more accurate translation would emphasize providing a branded experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otpremite svoj logo ili ga generišite iz teksta kako biste korisnicima pružili brendirano iskustvo. (or) Otpremite svoj logo ili ga generišite iz teksta kako biste korisnicima osigurali brendirani doživaj.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "provide on-brand experience to your users" is not accurately translated. The Turkish translation, "Kullanıcılara markanıza uygun bir deneyim sunmak" literally means 'to provide an experience suitable to your brand to your users.' A more natural phrasing would be 'markanızla uyumlu bir deneyim sunmak'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcılara markanızla uyumlu bir deneyim sunmak için logonuzu yükleyin veya metinden oluşturun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'These settings will affect all of your portals' is translated as 'Bu ayarlar tüm portallarınızı etkiler'. While technically correct, it could be improved to sound more natural in Turkish.  A more appropriate phrasing would be 'Bu ayarlar tüm portallarınızda geçerli olacaktır.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcılara markanızla uyumlu bir deneyim sunmak için logonuzu yükleyin veya metinden oluşturun. Bu ayarlar tüm portallarınızda geçerli olacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "продемонструвати користувачам ваш бренд" (demonstrate your brand to users) is a bit awkward. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of 'щоб забезпечити користувачам ваш бренд' (to provide your brand to users) or 'щоб надати користувачам відчуття вашого бренду' (to give users a sense of your brand).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Завантажте свій логотип або створіть його з тексту, щоб забезпечити користувачам ваш бренд.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand experience' is not directly translated. 'Thương hiệu' (brand) is used, but the nuance of 'on-brand' is lost. A more accurate translation might emphasize consistency or alignment with brand guidelines.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tải logo của bạn lên hoặc tạo logo từ văn bản để đảm bảo trải nghiệm nhất quán với thương hiệu của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a space before the period at the end of the sentence, which is not standard Vietnamese punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the period.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "为用户提供品牌化体验" (provide a branded experience to users) is a direct translation but might be too formal or jargon-heavy for a mobile settings context. A more natural phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 为用户呈现品牌形象 (present your brand image to users) or 让您的品牌更突出 (make your brand more prominent).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop (句号) at the end of the second sentence. While grammatically correct, a more concise and mobile-friendly style might omit it. Consider shortening the sentence if possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the full stop from “此设置将应用于所有门户界面。” and potentially combine it with the previous sentence if space is a concern.
